div.l: Swyued the Millers doughter bolt vpright
Whiles thou haste as a coward be a gaste
Ye false harlot hast thou so haste
A false traytoᵘur fals clerke quod he
Thou shalt be dede be goddis dignyte
Who durste be so bolde to de suche disperage
To my doughter that is of suche lynage
And by the throte bolle he caught Aleyne
And he hent hym dispitously ageyne
And on the nose he smote hym wᵗith his fist
Doune ran the blode vpon his brest
And in the floor wᵗith nose and mouth to broke
They walowed as pigges do in a poke
And vp they gon and don ayen anone
Tille the myller sporned at a stone
And doun he felle bakward on his wiff
That wist nothynge of this nyse stryff
For she was falle in slepe a litle wight
Wᵗith Iohn the clerke that waked hath alnyght
And wᵗith the falle out of hir slepe she breyde
Helpe holy cros of bromehem she seyde
In manus tuas to the lorde I calle
A wake Symond the fende is on me falle
My hert is broken I am but dede
There lyeth on my wombe and on my hede
Helpe symkyn for the fals clerkes fight
This Iohn stirt vp as fast as he myght
And grasped by the walles to and fro
To fynde a staff and she stert vp also
And knewe the estes bet than did this Iohn
And by the walle a staf she toke anon
And sawe a litle shymerynge of a light
